about.title: A Little About Me...
about.subtitle: Hi! I'm Aleksandra
about.about-description-1: I am a photographer from Toru≈Ñ. Photography is not just my job but above all my passion, which I have been developing for years. With each session, I try to capture unique moments and emotions that will last forever in the photos.
about.about-description-2: My professional development has been supported by participating in numerous workshops and courses, which helped me to improve my skills and learn new photography techniques. Thanks to this, my portfolio is diverse and full of inspiring works.
about.about-description-3: I specialize in various types of photography - from female and family portraits, through wedding photography, to commercial sessions. I always try to adapt to the individual needs and expectations of my clients so that each session is unique and fulfills their deepest dreams.
about.about-description-4: I invite you to explore my work and get in touch. Together, we can create something beautiful!

services.title: What Moments Can I Capture for You?

process.title: Process
process.process-text-2: We'll choose the location and date together.
process.process-text-3: You'll receive beautiful memories for a lifetime...

projects.title: If you're looking for something a bit unusual, you've come to the right place!

contact.title: Now that you know a bit about me and my work, help me get to know you!
contact.form-message: Thank you! I'll get back to you soon!
contact.form-placeholder-message: Hello Ola, I want you to take beautiful photos of me!
contact.form-error-name-minLength: Name must be at least 3 characters long
contact.form-error-email-pattern: Please enter a valid email address
contact.form-error-phone-pattern: Please enter a valid phone number with optional country code
contact.form-error-message-minLength: Message must be at least 5 characters long
